features.sectionHeadline: Built for your body, your way
features.sectionSubtitle: Every woman's experience of (peri)menopause is different. Helene adapts to yours — with the depth of a clinician and the warmth of a friend.
features.trustLine: Helene is designed in collaboration with gynaecologists and menopause specialists.

f1.headline: Check in by voice — or by tap. Either way, it takes two minutes.
f1.description: Every day, Helene asks how you're feeling. You can log your symptoms yourself, or simply talk to Helene out loud — she listens, understands, and responds as a real voice. No typing required. No forms to fill in. Just a two-minute conversation that your future self will thank you for.
f1.h1: Full two-way voice — Helene speaks back to you
f1.h2: Covers sleep, mood, hot flashes, energy & more

f2.headline: See your patterns. Then talk through them — with Helene.
f2.description: Helene turns your daily logs into clear charts and trends, so you can finally see what's going on in your body over time. And once a week, Helene runs you through the MRS — the Menopause Rating Scale, a validated clinical questionnaire used by doctors worldwide — so you have a real medical benchmark for how you're evolving.
f2.h1: Visual trends across symptoms, weeks & months
f2.h2: Weekly MRS score — the clinical standard doctors use
f2.h3: Discuss your data out loud or in writing with Helene

f3.headline: A community where you never have to explain yourself.
f3.description: In Helene's community, you never have to start with "you might think I'm crazy, but…" — because every woman here knows exactly what you're going through. Share what's working, ask what you're afraid to Google, and discover that what you're experiencing is far more common than you ever realised.
f3.h1: Women 40–60, at every stage of the journey
f3.h2: Real stories, practical tips, honest conversation
f3.h3: Moderated, safe, and free from judgment

about.heroHeadline1: We built Helene because the system
about.heroDescription: Menopause affects every woman. Yet most face it without real information, without daily support, and without anyone connecting the dots for them. We decided to change that.
about.storyCard1p1: "One woman in my family was told by her doctor that she would face severe symptoms. She spent months anxious, bracing herself for the worst — letting that fear shape her days, her relationships, her sense of self.
about.storyCard1p2: In the end, she had barely any symptoms at all. The worry itself had become the burden."
about.storyCard2p1: "The other didn't even know she was going through menopause. The mood changes, the disrupted sleep, the fog she couldn't shake — nobody told her any of it was connected.
about.storyCard2p2: She went through years of it completely alone, not understanding what was happening to her own body."
about.storyResolution: Two women. Two opposite failures of a system that should have been there for both of them.
about.storyClosing: That gap — between too much fear and not enough awareness, between information overload and total silence — is exactly why I built Helene.

about.missionHeadline: Every woman deserves a companion for the most overlooked transition in women's health.
about.missionDescription: Not a pamphlet. Not a ten-minute appointment once a year. A daily presence that tracks how you feel, surfaces what it means, and reminds you — every single day — that you are not alone in this.
about.valuesHeadline: Three principles that guide everything we build
about.v1title: Every woman deserves to be heard
about.v1body: Too many women are told "it's just aging" and sent home. We're building a space where no symptom is too small, no question is too obvious, and every experience is taken seriously.
about.v2body: Helene is grounded in clinical research. From the MRS — the validated medical standard for menopause assessment — to evidence-based guidance, every feature is built on science, not wellness trends.
about.v3title: No woman should navigate this alone
about.v3body: Menopause is one of the most universal experiences women share — yet it can feel profoundly isolating. Helene brings daily support, real data, and a community of women who understand because they're living it too.
about.teamHeadline: Built by people who give a damn
about.teamDescription: We are four data science students from Albert School × Mines Paris, united by the belief that technology can radically change how women experience this transition.
about.advisorText: We are actively looking for menopause specialists and medical advisors to join our scientific board.
about.closingHeadline: Ready to take care of yourself?
about.closingDescription: Join 2,400+ women already on the waitlist. Early access is opening soon.
